issue.subject: Filter on "provider" backend does not work
issue.description:
In "view=orders" in backend (list of orders in the SHOP component), the filter on provider does not work properly.

--> when selecting a provider, it sometimes returns a list of orders from different provider, not only the one selected.

--> organisms are not ordered by name in the html select
